i know hot to fix the "steam dll isnt worthy of our trust"! at least for the moment,its a temp fix that requiers you to change some stuff everytime you load a new game! 
This is what you do :
-start the game,get the error.
-go to install dir look for a steam_appid.txt
-open the file with notepad
-change the last number to 4001 or 4000
-save and launch the game
-next time you get the error change the number again and so on 
-works for me,thank me and thank uploader for an amazing job!
